title: I am stuck in a game
body: I was just playing a game with my friends and suddenly the game froze it is attempting to recconect. It's not only me but also my friends. What happend if i get leave buster

replies.body: A patch did roll out earlier today which could have caused a disconnection for your specific issue, but I believe ranked was disabled and updates are provided on our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Let me know if you are still having issues, and I'd be happy to help out!
The servers were taken offline to deploy Patch 6.15. They are online once again, patch and play!
